meanings.definition: The act of inserting a grommet into fabric or another material.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to do grommeting in her sewing class.
meanings.sent2: The grommeting on the curtains made them look more stylish.
meanings.sent3: The grommeting tool looked like a tiny metal donut puncher.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like grommeting, adding strength to his resolve.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the grommeting machine echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The process of securing or reinforcing with grommets.
meanings.sent1: The grommeting of the tarp kept it securely in place during the storm.
meanings.sent2: They completed the grommeting of the banner before hanging it up.
meanings.sent3: The grommeting job was so well done, it could withstand a hurricane!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like grommeting, adding support to his shaky confidence.
meanings.sent5: The grommeting process was meticulous, ensuring the structure's stability.
